content.body: > Opt-out review period: 6 April 2023 to 6 June 2023

m.new_content.body: why are we even under ecma

content.body: jmdyck: One thing of consequence to you is that we decided for https://github.com/tc39/proposal-import-attributes/pull/133 to allow "Deprecated" to apply not just to clauses but also individual steps. That's something you may want to take advantage of in https://github.com/tc39/ecma262/pull/2952.

content.body: Btw what's the status of #2952? Is it ready for review? I'd like to review and merge if it's ready.
I gotta update ecmarkup to support labelling individual steps, for both of those
